short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the provision of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation and supervision necessary to rent snowmobiles, snowmobile tubs/skimmers and trailers for transporting the snowmobiles, as required by the Department of National Defence (DND) for tasking or exercises in Alberta, Manitoba, Saskatchewan and British Columbia and the United States.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 28 September 2023 at 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the provision of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation and supervision necessary to rent snowmobiles, snowmobile tubs/skimmers and trailers for transporting the snowmobiles, as required by the Department of National Defence (DND) for tasking or exercises in Alberta, Manitoba, Saskatchewan and British Columbia and the United States.
duration_in_months: You have to calculate this field
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Title
*  **English Title**: W0127-23P010 - Snowmobile and Trailer Rentals
*  **French Title**: W0127-23P010 - Location de motoneiges et de remorques

## Solicitation Details
*  **Reference Number**: WS4136686153-Doc4137111908
*  **Amendment Number**: 1
*  **Solicitation Number**: WS4136686153
*  **Publication Date**: 2023-08-28
*  **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-28T14:00:00 (ET)

## Contract Details
*  **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-11-20
*  **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-10-31
*  **Tender Status**: *Expired*

## Goods and Services Classification
*  **UNSPSC Code**: *25101903 - Snowmobiles or Snow Scooters

## Trade Agreements
*  **Applicable Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA),Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP),...
*  **Comprehensive List of Applicable Trade Agreements can be found in **[Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17288312?extsite=MTcyODgzMTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).**

## Solicitation Location
*  **Service Location**: Alberta
*  **Delivery Locations**: Alberta

## Procurement Details
*  **Procurement Category**: *SRV
*  **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*  **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Contact Information
*  **Contracting Authority**: Tanya Gostev, (tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

(Note: I corrected some errors and made minor adjustments to the style and wording to make it clearer and more concise. The nuances of the original text are preserved, while the text is presented in a more professional, readable format.)EN
